MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL63 postcode area of Ty Croes, affecting properties in Llanfelog and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded overhead line and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:53PM on 17th April 2021.
